title: Remarks by President Biden Before Marine One Departure | The White House
content: South Lawn7:15 P.M. EDTQ    Could you give us your reaction to the International Criminal Court issuing an arrest warrant for Vladimir Putin? THE PRESIDENT:  Well, I think it’s justified.  But the question is, it’s not recognized internationally by us either.  But I think it makes a very strong point.Q    Are you confident the bank, sir — are you confident the bank crisis has calmed down? THE PRESIDENT:  Yes.Q    Will you give us a sense of your reaction to President Putin meeting with President Xi next week?THE PRESIDENT:  Well, we’ll see when that meeting takes place.  That’s (inaudible).Q    Any reaction to the House GOP memo about your family dealings, sir?THE PRESIDENT:  My family dealings?Q    Yes, your — (inaudible) that Hunter Biden’s business associate sent over a million dollars to three of your family members.  Any reaction to that?THE PRESIDENT:  That’s not true.Q    Should Putin be tried for war crimes?  (Inaudible.)THE PRESIDENT:  He’s clearly committed war crimes.7:17 P.M. EDT
